DOC.brief_summary: In response high injury rate soccer , Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) develop injury prevention program call `` 11+ '' . It design replace standard warm-up take 20 minute complete . The program proven remarkably effective decrease rate injury soccer player . However , uptake 11+ less desire . Adoption program may increase additional benefit demonstrate program introduce young age . The goal study ( 1 ) establish young athlete tolerate program , ( 2 ) measure effect 11+ program physical performance 10-12 year old girl . Three team randomly assign intervention group carry 11+ program duration indoor soccer season . Another 3 team continue usual warm-up . Pre- post-intervention , balance , agility , core strength movement control assess athlete . The investigator hypothesize athlete tolerate program well intervention group improve performance test significantly control group .
DOC.brief_title: Effect FIFA 11+ Injury Prevention Program Performance & Movement Control Young Female Athletes
DOC.criteria: Bonivital club level soccer athlete condition injury present pretesting may place athlete risk ( e.g . sprain ankle )
